TEXT.TITLE: STEINBERG SIGNS UP INDEPENDENT GROCERS
TEXT.BODY: <Steinberg Inc> said it has affiliated the first two independent grocers in the Montreal area to the Steinberg banner. It said it plans to announce shortly affiliations with independent grocers. Reuter
